name: Seven Stages
description:
Follow the journey of your character, beginning the seven stages of grief.  A loved one,
yourself,
the earth,
or mankind...

After all you’ll go through, the only way out will always be acceptance...

----------

Use ZQSD to walk but it's more enjoyable with a controller (left stick to move). 

Credits : 

  • Satya DAVID (GD, Music)
  • Pierre Mizzi (Graph, Dev)
  • Thibaud MISCHLER (Dev, GD)
  • Alexandre SABOUNI (Dev)
  • Nikita PESKINE  (Graph)
  • Kevin TALEB DEHKORDI  (GD)

Tech specifications : 

Made with Unity, Blender, Maya, Magix Music Maker.

Computer game.
